      • findCertificates

        @GetMapping(produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.hateoas.PagedModel<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<com.epam.esm.web.model.GiftCertificateRequestModel>> findCertificates(@RequestParam(value="searchParam",defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String searchParam,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="tags",defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String[] tags,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="sortBy",defaultValue="date")
                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String sortBy,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="sortOrder",defaultValue="asc")
                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String sortOrder,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="0")
                                                                                                                                                                                                      int page,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="size",defaultValue="2")
                                                                                                                                                                                                      int size)
                                                                                                                                                                                               throws com.epam.esm.service.exception.impl.ServiceException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      com.epam.esm.service.exception.impl.InvalidRequestDataException
        find paged, optionally filtered and sorted list of gift certificate representations
        Parameters:
        searchParam - search certificates by part of name or description
        tags - search certificates by one or many tag names
        sortBy - specifies how certificates will be sorted (date - by last update date, name - by name)
        sortOrder - specifies sort order (asc - ascending, desc - descending)
        page - page number
        size - number of elements on one page
        Returns:
        paged list of gift certificate representations with links to navigate through the pages
        Throws:
        com.epam.esm.service.exception.impl.ServiceException - if an error occurs
        com.epam.esm.service.exception.impl.InvalidRequestDataException
